caption:
When we created the design for this Florence apartment, we knew the kitchen needed to feel intimate, layered, and full of soul. Inspired by the tones of an 18th-century triptych, the palette brings softness and subtle contrast to a space where every detail tells a story. We’re so honored to see it featured in the Winter 2025 issue of @milieumag! 

Want to see more from this project and explore our other design projects in Paris and Italy? Comment ‘oui’ below and we’ll send you the link.

Architecture by Enrico Gandolfi
Photography by @joan.porcel
